channel.title: Starting a Server?
channel.description:
Hi,
I hope you understand what im going to ask and can help me! Ok, here it goes...
Say I download a Server from the download section of this forum, how do I run it?
Do I need and certain program, client or do I need a server IP. I can't seem to figure it out. Please help.
Thanks!!

item.title: Starting a Server?
item.dc:creator: @th3_mag3_on3 th3 mag3 on3
item.description:
@th3_mag3_on3 wrote:

first of all. if you want to download a ‘‘source’’ make sure you have winRAR.
second: to run your server: open the ‘‘source’’ that you downloaded > click on ‘‘runserver.bat’’ (or whatever name it is in your source)
and lastly: go and take a look at chapter 8 of this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html
there’s a extra ‘‘compile.bat’’ that you need to add in your file to run your server. save that in your ‘‘source’’ file.

Read full topic
